[![power-assert][power-assert-banner]][power-assert-video]

[![Build Status][travis-image]][travis-video]
[![NPM version][npm-image]][npm-video]
[![License][license-image]][license-video]


Produces assertion line output.

```
  assert(a.name === 'bar')
```


USAGE
---------------------------------------

`var AssertionRenderer = require('power-assert-renderer-assertion');`



INSTALL
---------------------------------------

```sh
$ npm install --save-dev power-assert-renderer-assertion
```


AUTHOR
---------------------------------------
* [Takuto Wada](https://github.com/twada)
